# Sports Betting - Task File

This file contains tasks for NBA/MLB sports betting model development.

---

## Active Tasks
- [ ] Pull historical NBA player stats (2020-2025 seasons)
- [ ] Implement feature engineering for NBA player props
- [ ] Build baseline model for NBA points prop predictions
- [ ] Implement walk-forward backtesting framework
- [ ] Set up live data pipeline for current season data
- [ ] Create sports betting dashboard

---

## Completed Tasks
- [x] Research completed on NBA player prop modeling approaches
- [x] Research completed on MLB pitcher prop modeling approaches
- [x] Research completed on free/cheap data sources
- [x] Research completed on open-source betting models
- [x] Railway Service with persistent volume confirmed working
- [x] HEARTBEAT.md shared instructions configured for all bots
- [x] Task file structure established
- [x] Sports betting project structure created with src/, data/, models/, notebooks/, logs/
- [x] Database models created (Player, Team, Game, PlayerGameLog, TeamStats)
- [x] NBA API data fetcher created with rate limiting
- [x] Main script with CLI interface created
- [x] Requirements.txt with dependencies defined
- [x] Feature engineering module created with rolling averages, rate stats, situational features
- [x] Database initialization and testing completed
- [x] Backtesting framework implemented (time-series validation, multi-model support)
- [x] Market making research fundamentals documented
- [x] Task tracking system established
- [x] All research and architecture documentation saved to memory/
- [x] Kalshi trading bot roadmap created (8-week development plan)
- [x] Advanced trading capabilities documented (iceberg, multi-level pricing, stop-loss, take-profit)
- [x] Simplified Kalshi bot approach created (REST + WebSocket hybrid)
- [x] Market making fundamentals documented (liquidity provision, risk management)
- [x] Market making task file created and configured

---

## Notes
- Kalshi API integration next (authentication, order placement, WebSocket real-time data)
- Need to convert NBA predictions to trade signals
- Risk management critical for multi-category exposure
- Arbitrage opportunities between prediction and betting markets

## Findings

**File Location:** The sports-betting tasks file exists at `/root/clawd/tasks/sports-betting-tasks.md` (the first path you suggested).

### Active Tasks (6 remaining):
1. Pull historical NBA player stats (2020-2025 seasons)
2. Implement feature engineering for NBA player props
3. Build baseline model for NBA points prop predictions
4. Implement walk-forward backtesting framework
5. Set up live data pipeline for current season data
6. Create sports betting dashboard

### Completed Tasks (23 items):
All research and foundational work is complete, including:
- NBA/MLB prop modeling research
- Data source identification
- Railway service setup
- Project structure creation (src/, data/, models/, notebooks/, logs/)
- Database models (Player, Team, Game, PlayerGameLog, TeamStats)
- NBA API data fetcher with rate limiting
- CLI interface main script
- Feature engineering module (rolling averages, rate stats, situational features)
- Backtesting framework (time-series validation, multi-model support)
- Kalshi trading bot roadmap and market making documentation

### Next Focus Notes:
- Kalshi API integration needed (authentication, order placement, WebSocket real-time data)
- Need to convert NBA predictions to trade signals
- Risk management critical for multi-category exposure
- Arbitrage opportunities between prediction and betting markets
